products.name: Vintage Rose Bucket
products.description: Adorable vintage-style bucket with a classic floral pattern.

products.name: Pearl Handle Basket
products.description: Elegant basket with faux pearl handles, perfect for a chic gift.

products.name: Blush Baby
products.description: Baby pink roses, ivory gerberas, orchids, and eucalyptus leaves come together in a soft and tender presentation.

products.name: Autumn Romance Preserved Flowers
products.description: A flower in the box of red roses and silver roses delivered straight from the fields is sure to create a lasting memory.

products.name: Shabby Chic Bucket
products.description: A charming bucket with a distressed finish for a rustic look.

products.name: Opaline Romance
products.description: This is a stunning, large floral bouquet featuring a vibrant mix of textures and shades. The arrangement is highlighted by lush, full-bloomed pink peonies and a cascade of elegant white Phalaenopsis orchids.

products.name: Opulent Roses Blossom Box
products.description: This is a luxurious floral arrangement presented in a sophisticated, round black box. The box is densely packed with dozens of vibrant red roses and is elegantly accented with two pristine white Phalaenopsis orchids on top.
